org.objectfabric

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectfabric.TObject
      • org.objectfabric.Resource

  • public class Resource
extends TObject
    Like a REST resource. Resources are represented by a class instead of returning their content directly to allow additional operations, like adding a listener for changes or reading the associated Permission. The resource value can be accessed using get() and set(Object), and can be anything from a text string to a complex object graph. Objects from a resource can only reference objects belonging to the same resource.
